page.title: Faculties and institutions of University of Peradeniya

rev.comment: This image use does not comply with [[WP:NFCC]] #10c and MUST be removed until it does. Thank you.
rev.diff:
Line 1: Line 1:
[[University of Peradeniya]] is currently composed of eight undergraduate faculties of study. These faculties contain 72 departments in total. In addition, university has two postgraduate institutions and six affiliated centres.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.pdn.ac.lk/overview/history.html |title=History of the University of Peradeniya |publisher=University of Peradeniya |date=2002 |accessdate=2010-05-28}}</ref>
